Key Match Events: Kevin De Bruyne scored Belgium's second goal in the 80th minute after a long punt from Koen Casteels.
Post-Match Reflections: Belgium coach Domenico Tedesco expressed relief at the win and suggested his team could have scored more goals.
Romelu Lukaku's goal was disallowed after a VAR review.
Miscellaneous Highlights: King Philippe and Queen Mathilde of Belgium were present at the match.
Romania missed a scoring opportunity when Dennis Man's shot was saved by Koen Casteels.
